title: MODY calculator applied in patients with clinical diagnosis of type 1 diabetes mellitus: Is a higher cutoff needed?
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Vinícius Vigliazzi Peghinelli, Maria Teresa De Sibio, Igor de Carvalho Depra, Milena Gurgel Teles Bezerra, Marna Eliana Sakalem, Adriano Francisco De Marchi Júnior, Paula Barreto da Rocha, Helena Paim Tilli, Bianca Mariani Gonçalves, Ester Mariane Vieira, Mariana Menezes Lourenço, Célia Regina Nogueira
